Class FireModalityAction

  • java.lang.Object

      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.ExtendableAction
        • it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.FireModalityAction
  • public class FireModalityAction
extends ExtendableAction
    Class used to create the actions that represent the effects of the various weapons present in the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • FireModalityAction

        public FireModalityAction​(Ammo cost,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.util.List<Branch> branches)
        Constructor that assigns the input parameters to their correspondences
        Parameters:
        cost - Amount of ammo needed to execute the action
        name - String that represents the action
        description - String used to further explain the effect of the action (used for visual purposes)
        branches - List of branches that can be entered by executing the action.

        private java.lang.String nameToUrl​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String description)
        Method that converts the name associated with the action to an image
        Parameters:
        name - String that represents the action
        description - String used to further explain the effect of the action (used for visual purposes)
        Returns:
        The path used to get the image when the action is going to be displayed to the user
